abstract: Letter from Rep Debbie Wasserman Schultz comments on March 24 Angelina Jolie Pitt Op-Ed column about undergoing surgical procedure to remove her fallopian tubes and ovaries.
lead_paragraph: Representative Debbie Wasserman Schultz, a Florida Democrat, responds to an Op-Ed article by Angelina Jolie Pitt.
snippet: Representative Debbie Wasserman Schultz, a Florida Democrat, responds to an Op-Ed article by Angelina Jolie Pitt.
